title: Dog Friendly 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Gold Coast, Available: 9/1/2022
posting_body: ['1218 N. Dearborn', 'Gold Coast', 'Spectacular Gold Coast two bedroom one bathroom just steps to Clark and Division Red Line features rehabbed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar, spacious living area, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms, great closet space, updated bathroom, laundry room in building, and pets are welcome!', 'Steps to shopping, nightlife, restaurants, and more!', 'UA1701', 'Please Call Aleksandra Chadiev at 224/322-5494\u202c to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 21269.', 'Urban Abodes', '773.676.9000', '<URL>', '3923 N. Ashland Avenue', 'Chicago, IL 60613', 'Equal Opportunity Housing']
